name: Sara May
background: Sara May serves as Director of Nonfiction, EMEA at Netflix France. Focus areas: Documentaries, factual series. They are looking for: Premium series with global appeal; features with festival potential; true crime with French elements. Overall network strategy: Netflix France seeks premium documentary content with global appeal that also offers distinctly French stories and perspectives, combining universal themes with local relevance and cinematic execution.
thematic_priorities: premium documentary content with global appeal
feature documentaries (90+ minutes) with festival potential
documentary series (4–6 episodes) with strong narrative arc
true crime series with French elements that can travel internationally
sports documentaries featuring high-profile French athletes or events
cultural documentaries showcasing French excellence with universal appeal
target_audience: French audiences with global reach potential
technical_requirements: Broadcast/streaming standards; details provided upon commissioning
Subtitles/captions; audio description per broadcaster requirements
current_calls: Reflect latest broadcaster priorities as outlined above; commissioner-specific interests included.
submission_process: Must come via established production company or agent
Detailed treatment with premise, format and episode breakdown
Submit via Netflix's established production partners
additional_info: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach. Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen. Encouragement of sustainable production practices. Support for projects across French regions (where applicable). Open to pitches from independent producers/companies.
